comments.content:
Hey Base, I know it’s frustrating if no one has answered your previous posting, but it’s probably one because no one currently has an answer. Reposting won’t help.

JH

thanx man, i know its not good to repost stuff, but i am really curious about this face,  
Its printed in 1867! and in that font! pretty modern standards

There is a face in [Jaspert´s Encyclopaedia of Typefaces](http://web.archive.org/web/20081029024156/http:/www.typophile.com/books/typespecimens) called Bowery that could be the one you are looking for, but the sample just shows the uppercase and it is was made in 1890 ?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081029024156im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Bowery_6117.gif)
does anyone know what font firefox uses in the address and tab bars?
